items.title: Aristotle Capital Value Equity Strategy Decided to Sell Honeywell International (HON) Due to Short-Time Uncertainty
items.description: Aristotle Capital Management, LLC, an investment management company, released its “Value Equity Strategy” first quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The U.S. equity market started the year with a modest decline, with the S&P 500 Index declining 4.27% during the quarter. Conversely, the Bloomberg U.S. Aggregate Bond Index rose 2.78% […]

items.title: Smart Building IoT (SBIoT) Market Disruptions: Riding a High-Growth Wave Through 2030 at CAGR 21.19%
items.author: Qks Group
items.description: The global Smart Building IoT (SBIoT) market is expected to grow at a compound annual growth rate of 21.19% through 2030, driven by the increasing adoption of IoT-driven building automation across various sectors. The report covers key industry players and explores emerging trends such as digital twins and AI-driven automation.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: The article lists Carrier as one of the key industry players in the Smart Building IoT market, but does not provide any additional details about the company.
The article lists Johnson Controls as one of the key players in the Smart Building IoT market, but does not provide any specific information about the company's performance or outlook.
The article mentions Schneider Electric as a key industry player in the Smart Building IoT market, but does not provide any specific information about the company's performance or outlook.
